hopobject.name: yaler
hopobject.pname: Remote Web and SSH access via Yaler
hopobject.body: Yaler is a simple, open and scalable relay infrastructure. Setting up the YalerTunnel command line tool enables remote Web and SSH access to your BeagleBone, even if it's located behind a firewall or NAT, without the hassle of port forwarding.
hopobject.shortdesc: Enable remote Web and SSH access to your BeagleBone from the (public) Internet, via the Yaler relay infrastructure.
